comic_script.description: A meeting room with team members reviewing documents, graphs on screen showing March 2025 stats.
comic_script.dialogue: Team, let's go over our tasks for March...

comic_script.description: Person coding on laptop, next to a phone with a new app interface for Bank Mega.
comic_script.dialogue: New features deployed for Nestle and Bank Mega.

comic_script.description: AI-Q bot assisting a Uniqlo customer with clothing choice in a virtual store.
comic_script.dialogue: How can I help you today?

comic_script.description: Team brainstorming at a whiteboard, sketching new ideas, looking forward to April.
comic_script.dialogue: Next month, let's push the boundaries!
